stablecoin.name: Stablecoin
stablecoin.description: Tokens that are fixed to an external asset, e.g. the US dollar

yield-farming.name: Yield Farming
yield-farming.description: Tokens that are doled out as rewards for providing liquidity to protocols

yfi-inspired.name: YFI Inspired
yfi-inspired.description: Tokens either associated with or inspired by the yEarn ecosystem.

yield-tokens.name: Yield-Bearing
yield-tokens.description: Tokens that are wrappers around yield-bearing asset pools

dex.name: DEX
dex.description: Tokens for decentralized exchange protocols that enable peer-to-peer trading of tokens

lending.name: Lending
lending.description: Tokens associated with permissionless lending pools

amm.name: Automated Market Maker
amm.descriptions: Tokens that govern on-chain automated market makers

synthetics.name: Synthetics
synthetics.description: Synthetic assets created to track the value of another asset

token-sets.name: TokenSets
token-sets.description: Token indices composed within Set Protocol

options.name: Options
options.description: Tokens that trustlessly recreate decentralized options contracts on other assets

oracle.name: Oracles
oracle.description: Tokens associated with decentralized oracle infrastructure

defi.name: DeFi
defi.description: Tokens associated with the decentralized finance movement.

business-services.name: Business Services
business-services.description: Tokens that are redeemable for a business service

exchange-based.name: Exchange Based
exchange-based.description: Tokens that offer holders discounts on trading fees and other benefits
